title: [FEATURE] Please make SKBitmap.IsDisposed.Get() PUBLIC (instead of 'protected internal').
body:
### Is your feature request related to a problem?

When I mistakenly dispose of an SKBitmap in our code, but someone else has a reference, I don't have any way (without throwing an exception) to find this out!   So I end up with exceptions randomly for this condition.

To prevent these exceptions, for cases where this is possible, it sure would be nice if I could do a safety check with "skbitmap.IsDisposed" -- but I cannot, because the getter is Protected, instead of Public.

Please make this Public!  I would sure appreciate that!

### Describe the solution you would like

public class SKBitmap
{
	public bool IsDisposed => isDisposed == 1;   // instead of protected internal
}

### Describe alternatives you have considered

n/a
